attributes.action: Provide free broadband wireless internet access in all towns and cities across the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should we have to pay to go online in public places? The internet is used to promote business therefore it should be free for customers to use in town and city centres.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
